Text:
Thanks msfenmore, much love! :)

how come you aren't getting the show from your old source anymore? not that its a problem, im just curious :P

I´m still getting it...but last week one day it was totally messed up and yesterday there were no shows ( B&B and Y&R) because of the news about the storm...! Hope with todays shows it will be back to normal...cause I like the other source better!!

thanks

I'm trying to find some of the older b&B and y&R can anyone tell me where i can download them at? I tried to here but there weren't any seeders.
Msfenmore is the only one i know who offers them. Im not sure why they wouldnt download for you. They always work for me just fine

MsFenmore ... Hoping that you are safe and sound during this terrible storm. Thank you for all your efforts in bringing us the episodes - very kind of you. Cheers from Down Under! ;-) ALSO got to say that the Stephanie 2-week flashbacks are BOLD GOLD! Enjoying them enormously and makes me nostalgic for the original cast.

MsFenmore ... Hoping that you are safe and sound during this terrible storm. Thank you for all your efforts in bringing us the episodes - very kind of you. Cheers from Down Under! ;-) ALSO got to say that the Stephanie 2-week flashbacks are BOLD GOLD! Enjoying them enormously and makes me nostalgic for the old days with the veterans!

I angree with MsMuffet  the flashbacks are very sweet and wonderfull for maybe the best actor of Bold..And she was a very beautifull woman,she still,is for us the older BATB viewers to remember and for the new to learn all about the history of bold.And ofcorse i think that MSFenmore is from Germany so she is very safe and stuff and no wories there but if she is from the states i will hope and pray for our friend to be safe and sound..MsFenmore u rule girl and God bless.;-)
Yeah thanks guys...I´m fine...and yes I ´m from Germany..so no reason to worry...:-)

to bleslie1 i can get the newer ones, but the ones from a month ago on i cant get to download. i put them up but there is never any seeders. so thought maybe she still had them and i could gt them
